# peach-input



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                    | Type     | Default           |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------ | -------- | ----------------- |
| `label`       | `label`       | The label text above the input | `string` | `''`              |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | The placeholder text           | `string` | `'Enter text...'` |
| `value`       | `value`       | The current value              | `string` | `''`              |


## Events

| Event         | Description                    | Type                  |
| ------------- | ------------------------------ | --------------------- |
| `valueChange` | Emitted when the value changes | `CustomEvent<string>` |
